entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
